name: SpaceShip Squad Fighter Wars
description:
SpaceShip Squad Fighter Wars!!!
A good dexterity with dodging skill is needed when process to another level. The space invaders will become more and more stronger as every bullet could put you through hell.
Features:

• Beautiful Game Graphics & Sounds
• Stunning Backgrounds
• Multiple Spaceships with different power ups and unique features
• Multiple Gameplay Modes
• User Friendly Controls
